title: Mask Mandate Reimposed on Afghan Women
sub_head: In other world news, the communist Covid lockdown continues in China.
body:
No one should be surprised that the new Taliban regime in Afghanistan is looking a lot like the old Taliban regime in Afghanistan. Kathy Gannon reports for the Associated Press from Kabul:
Meanwhile the communist regime in China is doing what communist regimes doâ€”making policy without regard to individual liberty. Winni Zhou and Martin Quin Pollard report for Reuters today on conditions in Shanghai and Beijing:
